content: {"message": "Hello Nacho, this is Donna from Arionkoder. I'm calling to confirm some details we have on record. Could you please provide your last name for our records?", "continue_chat": true}
Sure, my last name is Orlando.
{"message": "Thank you, Nacho. Just to confirm, your last name is spelled O-R-L-A-N-D-O, correct?", "continue_chat": true}

{"message": "Great, thank you for confirming, Nacho Orlando. That's all we needed for now. If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!", "continue_chat": false}
